Summary: The ufo was bright and bigger than usual and is there every night
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a sunday night and i was getting ready for bed, my mum who had opened the window had seen the ufo like shaped and started calling me to her "Aisha, Aisha quickly look at this", As i looked i was shocked to see how big it was it was too big to be a star and was very bright so i got out the digital camera and took lots of pictures then as soon as i loaded them onto my laptop i was stunned to see how UFO like it was and of course now i am a beleiver.
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Manchester
There was one other sighting in Manchester on or around April 15th 2007
